prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing thank-you greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "happy airplane flying between new york city and san francisco

magical 
sparkle
stars

vibe or message: thank you for your friendship and kindness 
for letting me stay in your beautiful room 
"
Style: üé® Watercolor
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Andrew
From: Mel
Message: "Thank you for your friendship and kindness!

So grateful for you! 

mahalo piha 
much aloha
mel"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way








Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "thank-you" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a thank-you card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Thank you for your friendship and kindness!

So grateful for you! 

mahalo piha 
much aloha
mel" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card with a watercolor painting style. The background features a soft gradient from pale purple at the top to a warmer pink at the bottom, with subtle watercolor textures and paint bleeds. Scattered across the sky are numerous small, glowing yellow stars and starbursts. In the upper left, a stylized, simplified white airplane with a friendly smiling face is depicted, leaving a trail of shimmering gold glitter and sparkle as it flies. Towards the center, in elegant, flowing gold cursive script, is the text \"For Andrew\". In the lower left, a golden depiction of the Golden Gate Bridge is visible, and in the lower right, a golden outline of the Statue of Liberty stands. The overall mood is magical, heartfelt, and whimsical, with a consistent color palette of purples, pinks, gold, and white.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card in a watercolor painting style, maintaining the same soft purple and pink gradient as the front cover. The background is subtly textured with watercolor washes and soft paint bleeds. In the center and slightly to the left, a cluster of stylized, glowing yellow stars of various sizes are scattered, with one larger, prominent starburst. A subtle, thin gold line forms a delicate, abstract swirl or path originating from the left side and moving towards the center, evoking a sense of continuation from the front cover's theme of travel. The bottom-right corner (approximately 1 inch square) is kept clear and undecorated for a QR code. The overall impression is serene, peaceful, and subtly artistic, with a consistent magical and heartfelt tone.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a greeting card with a watercolor painting style. The background continues the soft gradient of purple and pink hues, with visible watercolor textures and organic paint bleeds. Scattered across the background are stylized yellow stars and starbursts, some appearing to glow or shimmer. In the center of the page, there's a stylized, delicate golden pathway or swirl, reminiscent of a magical flight path. Interspersed within this golden element are tiny specks of gold glitter and subtle sparkles, creating a sense of wonder and enchantment. The composition is airy and visually appealing, continuing the theme of magical travel and connection, with a heartfelt and sincere tone. There are no people or characters depicted.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a greeting card with a watercolor painting style. The background features the soft gradient of purple and pink hues, with characteristic watercolor textures and subtle paint bleeds. The page is filled with scattered glowing yellow stars and starbursts, adding to the magical atmosphere. In the center, integrated beautifully into the artwork, is the handwritten message: \"Thank you for your friendship and kindness! So grateful for you! mahalo piha much aloha mel\". The handwriting is in a flowing, elegant gold cursive script, with a natural pen-like appearance and slight variations in line weight, conveying a warm and sincere tone. The message is positioned safely within the central area, surrounded by the starry watercolor background, creating a heartfelt and visually harmonious culmination of the card's theme."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a soft, pale pink watercolor background. A delicate, light-gold shimmering trail curves gracefully across the upper left quadrant of the card, leading from an unseen point towards the upper edge. The artistic style is watercolor, with visible paper texture and subtle organic paint bleeds, creating a gentle and serene atmosphere. There are no figures, text, or other decorative elements, ensuring a clean and minimalist resolution that complements the front and interior designs. The bottom-right corner is left completely clear, reserving ample space for a QR code. The overall impression is one of subtle elegance and peaceful closure.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a watercolor painting style, featuring a soft, dreamlike atmosphere. The color palette is dominated by washes of pastel purples, pinks, and warm oranges, blended with delicate paper texture and organic paint bleeds. The composition depicts an interior space with a hint of an arched doorway on the right, adorned with subtle, shimmering specks, and a simple, grid-patterned window on the left. Thin, luminous golden lines crisscross the scene, connecting small, glowing orbs of light, evoking a magical, starry night or a string of delicate fairy lights. The overall effect is one of gentle, ambient warmth and quiet wonder, suggesting a magical, ethereal space that complements the heartfelt message within a greeting card.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with prominent, large, soft-edged, stylized watercolor angel wings in a gentle gradient of peachy-pink and pale gold on the left and right sides, framing the central message area. The background is a subtle watercolor wash of soft lavender and pale rose, with faint, scattered hand-drawn white sparkles and plus signs, suggesting a magical, starry night. The handwritten message, "Thank you for your friendship and So grateful for you! mahalo piha much aloha mel", is presented in elegant, shimmering gold cursive script, centered between the wings, with ample white space around it for readability. The overall aesthetic is delicate, heartfelt, and ethereal, with a focus on the warmth of the message and the subtle, magical surrounding artwork. The watercolor style is characterized by soft blends, visible brush strokes, and a slight paper texture, all in a flat 2D aesthetic.
